item.description:
If you've never seen live Flamenco dancing, you are in for a treat! 

Compañía Rafaela Carrasco's Vamos al Tiroteo

From Seville, Rafaela Carrasco is a breathtaking dancer and one of the most important flamenco choreographers of her generation. With her company of five dancers and live musicians, she displays her rare ability to explore new concepts while maintaining the essence and integrity of flamenco in Vamos al Tiroteo. Set to a selection of popular Spanish songs originally recorded by Federico García Lorca and sung by La Argentinita in 1931, Vamos al Tiroteo brings new life and energy to the music that inspired a hugely influential generation of flamenco artists.

Our tickets will be in the middle mezzanine.  Cost: $34.00 per person! (Half-price plus all fees)  There is a very short RSVP window for this...so if you'd like to come, carpe diem and say YES now!    Some of us may meet for dinner beforehand - details as it gets closer to the time!

    PAYMENT INFO!
 PLEASE PAY VIA PAYPAL WHEN YOU RSVP!  
COST is $34 each.
Please send $34 via PayPal to me using this email: julie.chilton@yahoo.com.

IMPORTANT!  When you pay with Paypal, please click the tab that says "Personal" and where it says "This money is being sent as" click on "payment owed." 

I will buy the tickets on February 17
 

YOU MUST PAY WHEN YOU RSVP! 

Any RSVPs without payment will be moved the waiting list

 

 

Cross-posted with The Gang of Gadabouts.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby with tickets in hand at 7:45
item.name: Flamenco Fest 2012! HURRY!
